results.title: Early Treatment With Metformin in a Mice Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome Reduces Pain and Edema.
results.text_hl: Early Treatment With @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@ Model of @<m>DISEASE_Complex_Regional_Pain_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020918 @@@Complex Regional Pain Syndrome@@@ Reduces @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@Pain@@@ and @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@Edema@@@.
